QuestData.Title: The Lesson of the Sandy Fist
QuestData.Description: I'd like to observe you putting your new weapon to use, my young student. This will aid me in determining what degree of training will be best suited to your talents.$B$BWe have many training targets in the training grounds below. Practice your attacks upon them, and return to me once you're feeling comfortable with your new weapon.
QuestData.CompletionText: The training targets are just down the hill. Come back to me once you're finished.
QuestData.RewardText: Not bad, $n. You may indeed have chosen the proper path.$B$BGood. Let us continue.
